duties_responsibilities.duty: Schedule patients for office visit and procedure appointments.
Assist with high call volume and maintain physician schedules.
Take triage call messages for medical staff and view patient visit notes.
Assist in patient registration and financial transactions.
May schedule radiology/lab and include recall scheduling.
Assist with check-in and check-out of patients.
Collect patient and insurance payments and reconcile charges on a daily basis.
File records in appropriate sections of patient charts in EMR.
Prepare patient charts in advance and scan documents into charts in EMR.

skills.skill: Excellent written and verbal communication skills
